00031 
00032 Property &Property::get(const string &key)
00033 {
00034     Tokenizer tok(key, ".");
00035     Tokenizer::iterator n;
00036     
00037     n = tok.begin();
00038     if(n==tok.end()) return *this;
00039     
00040     Property *p;
00041     map<string, Property*>::iterator iter;
00042     if(*n=="") {
00043         p = this;
00044     }
00045     else {
00046         iter = _map.find(*n);
00047     
00048         if(iter == _map.end())
00049             throw runtime_error("property not found: " + key);
00050     
00051         p = (((*iter).second));
00052     }
00053     ++n;
00054     try {
00055         for(; n!=tok.end(); ++n) {
00056             p = &p->get(*n);
00057         }
00058     }
00059     catch(string err) { // catch here to get full key in exception
00060         throw runtime_error("property not found: " + key);
00061     }
00062     
00063     return *p;
00064 }
00065 
00066 std::list<Property *> Property::Select(const string &filter)
00067 {
00068     Tokenizer tok(filter, ".");
00069     
00070     std::list<Property *> selection;
00071 
00072     if(tok.begin()==tok.end()) return selection;
00073     
00074     selection.push_back(this);
00075         
00076     for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin();
00077             n != tok.end(); ++n) {
00078         std::list<Property *> childs;
00079         for (std::list<Property *>::iterator p = selection.begin();
00080                 p != selection.end(); ++p) {
00081                 for (list<Property>::iterator iter = (*p)->_properties.begin();
00082                     iter != (*p)->_properties.end(); ++iter) {
00083                     if (wildcmp((*n).c_str(), (*iter).name().c_str())) {
00084                         childs.push_back(&(*iter));
00085                     }
00086                 }
00087         }
00088         selection = childs;        
00089     }
00090 
00091     return selection;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void Property::PrintNode(std::ostream &out, const string &prefix, Property &p)
00095 {
00096     
00097     map<string, Property*>::iterator iter;
00098     if((p._value != "") || p.HasChilds())
00099         out << prefix << " = " << p._value << endl;
00100     for(iter = p._map.begin(); iter!=p._map.end(); ++iter) {
00101         if(prefix=="") 
00102             PrintNode(out, prefix + (*iter).first, *(*iter).second);
00103         else
00104             PrintNode(out, prefix + "." + (*iter).first, *(*iter).second);
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, Property& p)
00109 {
00110       Property::PrintNode(out, "", p);
00111       return out;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static void start_hndl(void *data, const char *el, const char **attr)
00115 {
00116     stack<Property *> *property_stack =
00117         (stack<Property *> *)XML_GetUserData((XML_Parser*)data);
00118 
00119     Property *cur = property_stack->top();
00120     Property &np = cur->add(el, "");
00121     
00122     for (int i = 0; attr[i]; i += 2)
00123         cur->setAttribute(attr[i], attr[i + 1]);    
00124     
00125     property_stack->push(&np);
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void end_hndl(void *data, const char *el)
00129 {
00130     stack<Property *> *property_stack =
00131         (stack<Property *> *)XML_GetUserData((XML_Parser*)data);
00132     property_stack->pop();
00133 }
00134 
00135 void char_hndl(void *data, const char *txt, int txtlen)
00136 {
00137     stack<Property *> *property_stack =
00138         (stack<Property *> *)XML_GetUserData((XML_Parser*)data);
00139 
00140     Property *cur = property_stack->top();
00141     cur->value().append(txt, txtlen);
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool load_property_from_xml(Property &p, string filename)
00145 {
00146   XML_Parser parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00147   if (! parser)
00148     throw std::runtime_error("Couldn't allocate memory for xml parser");
00149 
00150   XML_UseParserAsHandlerArg(parser);
00151   XML_SetElementHandler(parser, start_hndl, end_hndl);
00152   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, char_hndl);
00153 
00154   ifstream fl;
00155   fl.open(filename.c_str());
00156   if(!fl.is_open())
00157     throw std::ios_base::failure("Error on open xml file: " + filename);
00158 
00159   stack<Property *> pstack;
00160   pstack.push(&p);
00161 
00162   XML_SetUserData(parser, (void*)&pstack);
00163   while(!fl.eof()) {
00164     string line;
00165     getline(fl, line);
00166     line=line + "\n";
00167     if (! XML_Parse(parser, line.c_str(), line.length(), fl.eof()))
00168       throw  std::ios_base::failure(filename + ": Parse error at line " +
00169           boost::lexical_cast<string>(XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser)) + "\n" +
00170           XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)));
00171   }
00172   fl.close();
00173   return true;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void Property::PrintT2T() {
00177 
00178     map<string, Property*>::iterator iter;
00179 
00180     for(iter = _map.begin(); iter!=_map.end(); ++iter) {
00181              PrintNode(cout, (*iter).first, *(*iter).second);
00182     }
00183 }
